properties.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 17 at 6:59PM CST until January 18 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Bismarck ND
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind
chills. Wind chills as low as 45 below zero. For the Wind
Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as
low as 40 below zero.

* WHERE...Divide, Burke, Williams and Mountrail counties.

* WHEN...For the Wind Chill Warning, until noon CST Saturday.
For the Wind Chill Advisory, from noon to 6 PM CST Saturday.

* IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite
on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
properties.instruction:
Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you
wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.

NWSheadline: WIND CHILL WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST SATURDAY... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 6 PM CST SATURDAY
